930 
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS   
POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
TECHNOLOGY  
  
YABATECH          
Chemistry  and  any  one  (1)  of  
Biology/Agricultural Science  
  
  
  
 Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other 
Science or Social Science subject. Also requires 
Mathematics and Physics as UTME subject.  
INDUSTRIAL SAFETY AND  
ENVIRONMENTAL ENGINEERING 
TECHNOLOGY  
  
KAD-POLY 
PTI     
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry  
and any two (2) of  
Biology/Agricultural Science   
Technical Drawing,  
Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,  
Auto Mechanics, Metal Work,  
Woodwork (for Civil Engineering  
Tech.), Further Mathematics, English 
Language, Geography, Economics/ 
Commerce.  
At least a credit pass in English 
Language is required.  
Mathematics and any 
two (2) of Chemistry, 
Physics, Technical 
Drawing, Geography or 
Biology.  
a) KAD-POLY – requires any three (3) subjects from 
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Technical 
Drawing, Biology/Agricultural Science or 
Geography.  
INDUSTRIAL   AND LABOUR  
RELATIONS  
MINILS  
RAMATPOLY  
  
  
LABOUR STUDIES  
FEDFISH-LAG  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include 
English Language and Mathematics.  
  
Mathematics,  
Economics plus one (1)  
other relevant subject  
  
a) FEDFISH-LAG requires ‘O’ level credit passes in  
 English  Language,  Government,  
Economics/Commerce/Accounts and any two (2) 
from Literature in English, Mathematics, 
Biology/Chemistry/Physics and Geography/  
Agricultural Science.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
a) FEDFISH-LAG  requires  Government,  
Economics/Commerce and Literature in English  
WILDLIFE AND ECO-TOURISM  
  
BUCOA-HAD  
FEDWILD-NBUS  
    
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in  
Biology/Agricultural Science,  
Geography and any three (3) subjects 
from:  
Economics/Commerce,  
Physics,  
French Language,  
Chemistry,  
Religious Studies, plus ‘O’ 
level credit pass in  
Mathematics and English Language. 
Home Economics/Food and Nutrition, 
Agricultural Science/Biology.  
Mathematics, Physics 
and one (1) of  
Chemistry,  
Biology/Agricultural  
Science or Technical  
Drawing  
  
a) BUCOA-HAD – requires Biology/Agricultural 
Science, and any two (2) of Chemistry, 
Geography, Economics/Commerce and Religious 
Studies as UTME subjects.  
b) FEDWILD-NBUS – requires ‘O’ level pass at least 
in Mathematics and English Language.  ‘O’ level 
credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, 
Geography and any three (3) subjects from the 
following – Economics/Commerce, Physics, 
French Language, Chemistry, Religious Studies.
